locusDepositInclusionsFrequency.label: FREQUENCY OF INCLUSIONS (Specify inclusions by adding frequency to each type, e.g. 'Chipped Stones: 20 %'; 'Ash: 75 %')

locusDepositColourModifier.description: Enter colour modifier according to Locus Recording Sheet.

locusDepositColour.label: COLOUR
locusDepositColour.description: Enter colour according to Locus Recording Sheet.

locusCutShape.description: Choose one shape only. Select 'Other' if none applicable.

smallFindsAmountCollection.description: Amount of finds under this Find-Nr.

smallFindsProcessor.label: FIND PROCESSOR
smallFindsProcessor.description: Name of processer for this find or record.

smallFindsStorage.label: Storage Place
smallFindsStorage.description: GT Find Depots are located inside or in the garden of the Excavation House. Depot 1: large storage in Excavation House; Depot 4: small storage room in Excavation House containing finds collected during construction of canopy roof; Depot 2 & 3: Shipping containers in the garden of the Excavation House

depotRow.label: Row (Sira)
depotRow.description: Corresponding row in depot to locate find

depotBoxNr.label: Box Nr.
depotBoxNr.description: Number of box to locate find in depot

depotShelf.label: Shelf (Raf)
depotShelf.description: Corresponding shelf in depot to locate find

depotBoxPosition.label: Box Position
depotBoxPosition.description: Corresponding position in depot to locate find

findNumber.label: Find Number (FNR):
findNumber.description: Find Number for Smallfinds in GT documentation. Finds can have additional identifying numbers. Check for SGN-Nr. or Inv-Nr.

storageInventoryNumber.label: Inv-Nr.:
storageInventoryNumber.description: Finds in GT can have an additional Inventory Number as an extra identifier. At the end of every season officials from Urfa Museum will visit the site, evaluate all finds and collect some for display at the museum. These finds have an additional Inv-Nr. and extra recording lists. Check 'Museumslisten' within the analog excavation archive registers.

stonegardenNumber.label: SGN-Nr.:
stonegardenNumber.description: Finds in GT can have an additional Stonegarden Number. The 'Stonegarden' is a walled area on site, where large, heavy or bulky finds are stored and on display, for example intact grinding stones.

etüdlükNumber.label: Etüd-Nr.:
etüdlükNumber.description: Finds in GT can have an additional Etüdlük Number. At the end of every season officials from Urfa Museum will visit the site, evaluate all finds and collect some for the museum study collection. These finds have an additional Etüd-Nr. and extra recording lists. Check 'Museumslisten' within the analog excavation archive registers.

fixMe!.label: fixMe!
fixMe!.description: Data dump from previous databases that need fixing, e.g. duplicate find numbers. Note that Urfa DB (by Andrè Beuger) has an extra sheet where all duplicate entrys are saved and displayed.

lithicRawMaterial.label: RAW MATERIAL
lithicRawMaterial.description: Das Rohmaterial aus dem ein Einzelfund besteht.

lithicRawMaterialGroup.label: RAW MATERIAL GROUP
lithicRawMaterialGroup.description: Makroskopisch definierte Rohmaterialgruppen der am Fundplatz vorkommenden unterschiedlichen Silicite.

lithicColor.label: COLOR
lithicColor.description: Färbung des Einzelfundes anhand makroskopischer Aufnahme und optionaler Abgleich mit Munsell-Farbkatalog.

lithicOptic.label: OPTIC
lithicOptic.description: Optische und haptische Wahrnehmung der Oberfläche.

lithicThermic.label: THERMIC
lithicThermic.description: Nachweisbare thermische Einwirkungen auf Artefakt vorhanden oder nicht.

lithicPreservation.label: PRESERVATION
lithicPreservation.description: Erhaltung der Grundform: Ist das Stück in Länge und Breite vollständig oder nur fragmentiert erhalten.

lithicCIM.label: CORE INITIALISATION AND MAINTENANCE PRODUCTS (CIM)
lithicCIM.description: An dieser Stelle werden bestimmte Kernpräparationsprodukte sowie Schlagunfälle vermerkt. Beides lässt Aussagen über die angewendete Technik zur Kernpräparation zu.

lithicTechnology.label: TECHNOLOGY
lithicTechnology.description: Hier werden Technikelemente genannt, welche in direkten Zusammenhang mit dem Kernabbau stehen und eine relativchronologische Relevanz besitzen können.

lithicToolModification.label: TOOL MODIFICATION
lithicToolModification.description: Kurze Abfrage ob ein Artefakt als modifiziert (Gerät) oder unmodifiziert ist.

lithicToolPreservation.label: TOOL PERSERVATION
lithicToolPreservation.description: Erhaltung des modifizierten Artefakts (Gerät): Modifikationen führen zu einer unvollständigen Erhaltung einer Grundform. Um festzustellen ob ein zum Gerät zugerichtetes Artefakt in seiner Form als Gerät vollständig oder fragmentiert erhalten ist, wurde diese Abfrage hinzugefügt.

lithicStrikingPlattform.label: STRIKING PLATFORM
lithicStrikingPlattform.description: Sofern vorhanden, wird hier der Zustand der Schlagfläche bzw. des Schlagflächenrests (butt) aufgenommen, welcher nach dem Abbau und der möglichen Modifikation am Artefakt verblieben ist.

lithicBulb.label: BULB
lithicBulb.description: Beschreibt den Zustand des Bulbus, wenn vorhanden.

lithicStrike.label: STRIKE
lithicStrike.description: Interpretation der Schlagart (-technik), welche teils auf den vorigen Merkmalen wie STRIKING PLATFORM und BULB basiert.

lithicStrikeDirection.label: STRIKE DIRECTION VENTRAL DORSAL (SDVD)
lithicStrikeDirection.description: Schlagrichtung der Negative auf der Dorsalseite im Vergleich zur Schlagrichtung der Ventralseite

lithicUsewear.label: USEWEAR
lithicUsewear.description: Kurze Abfrage ob Gebrauchsspuren, welche keine Modifikationen sind, an dem Artefakt vorhanden sind oder nicht.

lithicMod1.label: MODIFICATION 1
lithicMod1.description: Primäre Zurichtung eines Artefakts zu einem bestimmten Gerät. Diese sind hierarchiesiert (u.a. nach ihrer relativchronologischen Aussagekraft), bedeutet, dass z.B. eine Pfeilspitze als Modifikation über einem Kratzer steht.

lithicMod2.label: MOD2
lithicMod2.description: Weitere Modifikationen, welche an dem Artefakt festzustellen sind.

sampleTypeOther.label: Specify sample type 'Other' with additional text.

labNumber.label: LAB NUMBER
labNumber.description: If individual laboratory numbers have been assigned by the processors, please indicate here.

season.label: SEASON
season.description: Fieldwork season or campaign accourding to GT documentation.

sampleDepth.label: SAMPLE DEPTH
sampleDepth.description: Record depth of sampling accourding to documentation during fieldwork.

sampleRemarks.label: REMARKS ON SAMPLING
sampleRemarks.description: Remarks on sampling accourding to documentation during fieldwork.

sampleHasMeasurement.label: HAS MEASURMENT
sampleHasMeasurement.description: Has the location from which the sample originates been recorded?

sampleDocumentation.label: SAMPLE DOCUMENTATION - Drawing Nr./Foto Nr.
sampleDocumentation.description: Indicate if sampling has been recorded in drawings (Planum) and images.

description.label: REMARKS ON PROCESSING
description.description: Specify sampling and processing with further information. Use full name of any involved person, [e.g. who did the flotation, who worked on the microscope] and short description of work [e.g. floted, extracted, chemical treatment]

methodOfAnalysis.label: METHOD OF ANALYSIS
methodOfAnalysis.description: The same sample can be used for different analyses, e.g. soil sample for macrobotany, phytoliths and geochemical analyses.

sampleCollectionMethod.label: SAMPLE COLLECTION METHOD
sampleCollectionMethod.description: Description of how the sample was taken during fieldwork or from an object. Is it in original condition?

sampleProcessingStatus.label: PROCESSING STATUS
sampleProcessingStatus.description: Indicate state of sample. Important: Is it processed, e.g. floted, chemicals, any other treatment?

sampleSize.label: SAMPLE SIZE
sampleSize.description: This is important for the choice of method. If possible, specify as accurately as possible in volume (l) or weight (g).

sampleLocation.label: SAMPLE LOCATION
sampleLocation.description: Update on location during sampling and processing.

sampleProcessingLabratory.label: PROCESSING LABRATORY
sampleProcessingLabratory.description: Name the lab if out-of-house processing of samples are initiated.

sampleRemains.label: SAMPLE REMAINS
sampleRemains.description: Fill out if an analysis has already been carried out with this sample and remaining material is still present. Important: Has the remaining material been treated? If so, with which chemicals and treatments?

sampleRemainsQuantity.label: QUANTITY OF SAMPLE LEFTOVER REMAINS
sampleRemainsQuantity.description: Indicate weight/volume of leftover sample material

smallFindsMaterialCodeOld.description: Material with Urfa DB Material code-number

UrfaDbRecordCreationDate.description: Date of creation for dataset record in Urfa Database
